opinion.case_name: Lofton v. Secretary, Florida Department of Children and Families

opinion:
543 U.S. 1081

LOFTON ET AL.
v.
SECRETARY, FLORIDA DEPARTMENT OF CHILDREN AND FAMILIES, ET AL.

No. 04-478.

Supreme Court of United States.

1

C. A. 11th Cir. Motion of Child Welfare League of America for leave to file a brief as amicus curiae granted. Certiorari denied. Reported below: 358 F. 3d 804.
